Function reference

Cryptocurrency Market Data

OHLC and Sentiment data

getFGIndex()
Get the daily Fear and Greed Index for the cryptocurrency market
getQuote()
Get a quote on a cryptopair from one of the supported exchanges

Supported calls

All available API parameters

availableExchanges()
Get available exchanges
availableIntervals()
See all available intervals for the futures and spot markets on the desired exchange
availableTickers()
Get all the available tickers on the desired exchange and market

Main charts

The main charts

chart()
Create an interactive financial chart
kline()
Chart the OHLC prices using candlesticks
ohlc()
chart quote using ohlc bars

Charting indicators

Adding indicators to charts

addBBands()
Add Bollinger Bands to the chart
addEvents()
add eventlines to the chart
addFGIndex()
Chart the Fear and Greed Index
addMA()
Add various Moving Average indicators to the chart
addMACD()
Add MACD indicators to the chart
addRSI()
Add RSI indicators to your chart
addVolume()
Add volume indicators to the chart
chart()
Create an interactive financial chart

Datasets

Sample datasets returned by getQuote

ATOMUSDT
USDT denominated ATOMS, with 15m intervals
DOGEUSDT
USDT denominated DOGECOIN in 1m intervals
